Decorate it Better

Allow us to decorate your home and make it look professional and personal. Give your home the make-over it deserves and show potential buyers how amazing their future home is!

Make More Money

Data supports claims that home staging can increase the sale price of a home by at least 3%. It may not sound like much, but at a sale price of $200,000, that means you're making an extra $6,000.

Sell it Faster

Staged homes sell anywhere from 20-50% faster than unstaged homes. People want to buy and live in a home that looks and feels great, let us help you with that.

EZ Home Staging has a simple goal. We want to help you sell your home faster and for more money. Whether you need a single room staged or your entire home, we are here to help. EZ Home Staging offers a tiered pricing model; however, there is no initial charge or risk to you for the first three months. If you choose to work with us and your home doesn’t sell in three months, we will pick up our furniture and accesories and give you an invoice for exactly $0, yes, ZERO dollars. You only pay us if your home sells.
